sect1.title: Ubuntu Installation
sect1.para:
You need to download and install two packages:
Example: libfwbuilder_4.0.4-b2513-ubuntu-karmic-1_i386.deb
Example: fwbuilder_4.0.4-b2513-ubuntu-karmic-1_i386.deb
To satisfy dependencies, you need the following packages installed on your system:

listitem.para: QT 4.3.x, 4.4.x, 4.5.x, 4.6.x. Fwbuilder uses features available in QT 4.3 or later, it will not work with 4.2

sect1.para: You can get QT via your favorite package manager.
